value: Then the night passed. Several hours passed after a long night's sleep. Vinny just wakes up feeling someone poking him.
N..Nooo, no, I still don't want to ride you, you... you... you promised me... you'd let me...
Vinny was trying to move on the mattress, but he was starting to feel more pokes, poking him face and the nose.
N..No no...A..ah.
Vinny was starting to open him eyes slowly, woking up during the progress.
W..What? Is that you? My... my sweetheart?
Vinny start to smell something delicious. He was a little confusing about it. Vinny's hoof then tried to poke something randomly.
Hmmmm...

Vinny was beginning to get up from the mattress toward the smell, but when Vinny tried to do that, Vinny came face to face with Rayane's face, accidentally touching her nose while she was levitating the Vinny breakfast.
Pika boo~
Rayane touch her nose against Vinny nose while making a silly, mischievous face.
Hello~
Vinny was a little surprise before giggling in response.
Heh! Hiii charming Rayane. What did I miss?
Vinny tried to look at another direction, but Rayane used her magic and changed the direction of Vinny's face to her face again.
Shhhhhhh... Silly. You almost missed your breakfast~
Vinny was slightly blushed by Rayane's action.
Ooohwn...
Then Vinny looks into Rayane's eyes.
Did I mention that you have beautiful eyes?
Rayane giggles a little and pokes Vinny nose. Then Rayane put the breakfast next to Vinny.
Heh. Beautiful eyes to look at my dream~ I woke you up as I promised you.
Oh... Maybe my breakfast might be something else one day.
Vinny does a malice look at Rayane but then shook his head to wake up.
Oh... Please! You can forget what I said! Good morning! Did you sleep well? How is everyone?
Hmmmmmmmm... Something else?~ Heheh.
Rayane smirks at Vinny.

Don't think I forgot everything you said in the last few days. Silly you~ But yes, this was a good night's sleep. Almost everyone is still sleeping. Kai was the only one who got out of bed besides me.
Vinny was a little curious to hear this.
Y..Yeah! He must be under a lot of pressure.
Then Vinny was starting to eat breakfast as he answered Rayane.

It's understood, he'll have to explain to everyone what happened with the bomb, Hiroshi, about him. And still make a plan to make everyone happy. I hope he gets him among all the guards he was the most different.
Vinny looks at James and when he saw James sleeping, Vinny does a trollface before came back to Rayane.
Hehe boy. But before I need to have a little fun.
Hmm... Kai's meditating, and looking at the forest. Well... What is the silly boy planning?~
Vinny was then a little surprised to hear Rayane's question.

M..Me? Naaaah... I'm worried about James. He wants to solve some issues with Rainbow Queen. James is a little crazy. It's making a deal or a crazy pact. Anyway, I'll make him change his mind and if he doesn't want to. At least he tell me when he's going to do that.
Rayane then got a small feeling of worried, trying to understand what was going on.
W...What? Pact? What is happening to James?
Huh? Pacts with Rain? So you completely told him everything about her?
Well... I told James everything I know. Not the whole truth.
Vinny looks at James, worried about his actions in the future.
A...aaah... As James is part of this family. Heh! Here! Take this.
Vinny turns on the cell phone, then Vinny gives the cell phone to Rayane.
The phone is filming, recording this moment in real time. Heh! You need to record me waking up James in a delicate way, just point at us with the cell phone down. Alright?
Rayane was still curious and worried about hearing all this, but tried to stay calm to see what Vinny was doing.
Vinny, please... James needs to be very careful. Rain is very smart when it comes to pacts. She specializes a lot in that.
Hehe. Nah... This time no scare. This is just a caress. This is Affection.
Vinny lay down next to James almost face to face, and spoke very gently caressing him.
Hey James... How strong you are? Can you carry me? You're very strong! Carry me my love.
Ah? Affection? Vinny... You're being really silly. What's going to come out of this?
Rayane giggles a little, trying to hide the concern a little.
C...Carry you...zZzZzZz?...W..What?..Is that really you? ZzZzZzz....N..Never spoke..to me like that....ZzZzZz...
James was sleeping, but he was confused, and he was trying to hug Vinny while he was sleeping. Meanwhile, Rayane was trying to hold back so she wouldn't laugh too much while filming.
Silly~
Ah... Ah? No! No! James... You've done a lot so far, you and your friends have done and saved a lot of lives. Everyone is trusting you. Me never talked to you that way? But do you know who i am?
Bu...but how? Y...you...ZzZz... aren't you Ariella? H..hey wait...
James tries to touch Vinny again and again while still sleeping. Rayane was still laughing, but she was curious about what she was hearing.
W...What? Ariella? Did he really say this name? What's going on here?
Heh. Silly you will have to escape now~

Hey hey! Calm down, I'm not Ariella, you're very euphoric. James! Everything will be fine. Just relax and let life go on, you need to calm down and start liking Vinny and Rayane more. They like you a lot.
Vinny does a face poker, trying to move away from James during the process. James stopped trying to touch Vinny when he heard the Vinny dialogue.
Wh..what? Are you not Ariella? Who are you?
James slightly tried to open his eyes during the talk.
Viiish... Turn around Rayane!
Vinny got up and threw himself on the mattress he was sleeping. Vinny then tried to pretend him was sleeping.
W...What? H..huh? And..wait... No! What fuck is this?!
James woke up and keep trying to touch some hoof desperately, dragging himself on the floor, and looked around completely confused.
Wh...what? AH? R...Rayane?!
Rayane laughed at Vinny and James as she continued filming the scene.
Look who woke up~ Silly scientist.
What?
James keep thinking about the dream for a few seconds.
VINNY!
Vinny still pretending to be asleep.
Interesting! Very interesting you two! The cutest unassuming couple I've ever seen!
James was approaching Vinny, wanting to get some satisfaction. While the whole silly moment continued, even though Rayane demonstrating is laughing at the situation, she was still thoughtful.
This is very curious. Where Vinny wants to come with all this? Is this part of his plan about Rain? Should I be more careful if he is really thinking about doing what I'm thinking?
Vinny keep pretending she was sleeping, but James levitated Vinny, and looked at him face, waiting for Vinny to open the eyes.
Hey silly joke. Wake up!
H..hey hey! Calm down! Rayane come here and give me a hug! Because the James eyes are beautiful!
Vinny keep pretending to be sleeping, trying to hug the wind.
What?! Are you problem?! Rayane will have a very special marshmallow for you now! Wake up!
James began to shake Vinny in every way possible. Meanwhile, Rayane continued laughing.
If you two don't stop, I'll have to stop you both my way~
AAAAAAAAH! James!! Stop shaking me!! WHAT THE HELL! Why are you shaking me and Rayane taking a picture?! This is some kind of prank?! Let me go bro!
So explain that fucking you are doing here!!
Rayane does a facehoof when she realized that she had no other alternative. So Rayane smirks and activated the horn magic again and made Vinny and James kiss accidentally during the talk.
Silly ones... stop~
H...huh?! WHAT?! W...WHAT?! OH FUUUCK!! GET OUT!!
AAH?! NO NO! STOP KISSING ME!! WHAT'S HAPPENING HERE?!
The two ones were embarrassed and blushed, trying to get out of the scene. Meanwhile, Rayane keep laughing as she finally finished filming.
Did you notice? It didn't even hurt. Now it's time for you two to stop~
Vinny does a super poker face, trying to understand the situation.
AH! You take my cell phone, make these pranks and do this. What did I do to you?
Meanwhile, James was leaving the scene, desperate trying to clean his mouth.
AAAAH!
Heh~ It wouldn't be funny for this joke to end with nothing productive with my favorite dream~ Something had to come out of this.
Rayane then returned the Vinny's phone to him. When Vinny looked around, everyone had woken up, confused trying to understand the scene. But Ivy was still sleeping.
H...Heh! Weeell... That was just personal training. Nothing too special! Okay?
Vinny then hides his phone during the conversation. Jeff was just doing a poker face before asking the question.
Hmmm... Are you ok Vinny?
Wagner was speechless to describe the situation. Rowan was laughing lightly, trying to hide the silly laughs.
Heh~ I want photo credits.
Y..Yes! Fine! Photo credits! Well...
Vinny looks at James, doing a nervous laugh.
Aaah... James? Good morning. Did you sleep well?
Me? Aaaah! Me! I slept very well! Super hyper mega well!
James then got out of the mattress and started preparing him stuff.
Yeah! That's good, I'd give you a hug. But I think after everything that's happened... I don't think a hug is necessary anymore.
Vinny giggles a little more nervously.
I'm sorry to wake you. B..But... My plan was blown away. Good morning everyone! James, I can hug you more times later.
Everyone remained confused, but still tried to answer.
Y...Yeah? Good morning!
I see... G..Good morning.
Ah? Hug me? Hug me... Oh! hug me! What do you think you were doing?! Okay! Stop!
Sssssh~ Vinny and James. Don't forget to finish eating the breakfast. We have a walk until the next village.
B...But! I want to see the replay! I can?
Rowan smiles during the question.
There's no replay!
Vinny does a poker face, turning off the cell phone.
Okay! Good morning!
Vinny then continued to eat breakfast again. Everyone looked at the breakfast made by Rayane. And everyone started eating, trying to pretend nothing happened.
Heh. I hope everyone is enjoying breakfast~ I'll be outside waiting for my dream to finish waking up.
Rayane then began to levitate Ivy's mattress, preparing to analyze if Ivy was fine. Wagner was still curious about Ivy, but tried to disguise this feeling a little.
W...well... When everyone leaves the tent, I... I... okay. Another time I talk better about it.
Rayane looks curiously at Wagner for a few seconds, but Wagner looked very shy, he just came back what he was doing. Rayane just pretended that nothing had happened.
Phew... Excellent. I did. I made everyone calm down faster. I can't lose much time. I still need to finish what I started. This pegasus needs to survive.

Rayane breathed deeply in a very thoughtful way. Then Rayane decides to use magic to help to put the Ivy mattress on the outside of the tent. Rayane could see that the place is a beautiful day outside. The atmosphere was much happier and sunny. Just the sound of nature, and without the storm, Rayane could see that there was already another village close to the camp.

Oh. The next village is here. Okay. I have to be very careful. Rain's pets should be curious about who is this pegasus. Vinny is also very curious about Rain's pets. Vinny must be trying to approach Rain in some way. I will try my best to make us focus on Ivy. This situation cannot go out of control.
Rayane? How is Ivy doing?
Rayane then stopped what she was doing, looking curiously at Vinny.
A...Ah? Vinny? Oh yes! She's still sleeping. I was surprised she still hasn't woken up to all this noise. But at least her Smartmoby is working.
Should we wake her up to give her breakfast?
Rayane is a little thoughtful for a few seconds before answering.
Hmmmmm... Heh~ If she doesn't wake up, I'll have to use plan b to feed her.
Ah? Well! She was conscious with me, she really must be very tired or weak. What did you guys do to her while James and I were arriving?
Rayane gets a little surprised and worried, but she tried not to make this feeling much.
Silly~ I just put her to sleep. If James can't help her, we'll have to go to the doctor.
Vinny looks at Rayane suspiciously for a few seconds.
You should have thought about that before making us almost kiss, right. She's alive, she must be very exhausted, she was talking, you saw it yourself. What could have happened? Do you have any idea?
Shhhhhh~ Silly one.
Rayane breathed a little deep when looking at Ivy.
Okay... I don't know how to say it. I don't understand much about health. Maybe she's too weak to wake up. We can't waste much time here now.

Well, anyway, just opening her eyes helps someone feed her. I'm going to ask James if he knows what's going on. Anyway... I'm going to look for Kai, it's dangerous for him to be alone, someone can kidnap him.
Rayane does a little sad look at Ivy as she responded.
Yes. This is fine. Don't forget... We're close to the Blackburn Village. Ivy can get some medical care there.
Vinny was a little surprised to realize that Rayane knew the name of the next village.
A..Ah. Okay.
Vinny was thoughtful for a few seconds. Then Vinny finally decided to go to James.
Blackburn! Yeah! What does James know about this place?
Hey James! Sorry for the way I woke you up... How are you?
James then finished preparing him stuff and walked toward Vinny.
Me? Ah... Good.
James breathed deeply, trying not to talk much about it. Then James was starting to leave the tent toward Rayane.
James? Aah... Well... How is Ivy?
James was a little surprised to hear the question, but then the conversation continued.

Ivy is on the same situation... lots of broken bones, difficulty breathing... But she's alive. I was very confident in trying to help her, but I got really scared when I saw that her body was so much more damaged than I imagined. I don't have enough training to do this kind of thing.
James breathed deeply before continuing the conversation sadly.
I'm sorry Vinny. I can't be useful for you now.

W..What? Oh no no no. Do not need to be sad! Her being alive already helps and a lot. I'm here to thank you for helping her. Anyway, Rayane said we're close to Blackburn. We can get some assistance there. As much as I think it will cost money.
James raised his head, trying to be positive during the talk.
Oh? Blackburn? Well, yes, it's a good place. But remember that we can't stay long in this village with Ivy. This village is sometimes a little haunted at night.
James was a little thoughtful for a few seconds.
But well... At least these haunts do not even let the bad ponies try to invade the houses.
Vinny is surprised, so him responded with a lot of curiosity on the subject.
This is interesting... Can you explain more?

R...Really? Okay. There is a haunted village next to Blackburn. It is an abandoned village that was supposed to be another common village in this region, but it seems that its founder ended up being cursed and disappeared. So sometimes strange things happen coming from this village towards Blackburn.
James looked curiously at Vinny, suspecting something.

This mysterious village is a huge cemetery. if you don't take care of yourself right, you could be unlucky for something to happen to you. Do not try to let the ghosts of this village have a lot of contact with you!

Hmmmmm... Anyway we need to go to Blackburn to take care of Ivy, priorities first, then we hunt ghosts. Heh! Thanks for the help again. I'll try to find Kai and talk to him. Kai is Hiroshi's successor, he must be very anxious now.
James then levitated the backpack, ready to put in the back again. James was a little thoughtful as he answered.
We hunt ghosts? What? You're welcome. W...Well...
Don't forget the tablet!
Vinny spoke a little softly for only James to hear.
This tablet may be something that will help us. Alright?
Then Vinny put his sunglasses when he finished speaking while James was a little surprised.
A..ah... the tablet. Yes! I kept it in my backpack.
Meanwhile, Rayane was getting ready to put Ivy on her back. Rayane was looking a little emotional at Ivy.
So you are ready Ivy. Let's take you to the hospital. I know the perfect way for us to run there without being at risk of hurting you.
Ah? Rayane? Are you doing? When are you going to take me to the places on your back?
Oh? V..Vinny? Heh~ Silly you. Are you thinking about?~
Rayane then put a cover to almost completely cover Ivy's body, so she was safe during the travel. Vinny was then curious wanting to know what Rayane was doing, but he first asked a silly question.
You carrying me to a mountain of money on your back. Me and you on a galloping travel. Heh heh! What will you do? Will you want to look for help now?
Mountain of money? Silly you. There's something much better than money~
Rayane giggles a little sadly as she prepared a magic on Ivy's body slowly.
But yes, we need to go now. You need to help everyone to be oriented to go to the village as I take Ivy to the hospital.
Vinny was a little surprised and curious during the talk.

So let's go. But wait... Something better than money? Would it be another time you and me alone? Hmmm... You can't stop thinking about it. Hihi! One question for you! Why does it seem that every time you look at ivy you seem to get emotional?
Rayane was then a little thoughtful for a few seconds before breathing deeply and sadly.

This is special moments. I feel sorry for her. So lonely to just die this way. She reminds me of some things from my past, for me it would be unfair for her to just leave this way without having enjoyed something good in her life.
Rayane continued to concentrate magic in the horn, almost finishing preparing what she wanted to do.
Vinny... I promise I'll see you again when she's safe in the hospital.
Ah? No no! I'll go with you!
Rayane was then a little surprised by Vinny's determination.
Are you sure? And you weren't going to talk to Kai?
I...I... Well! Anything him just came to me! You know!
Vinny... Don't worry about me.
Kai then approached, surprising a little Vinny and Rayane. Kai was there listening to the entire conversation.
K..Kai?
Huh!? How did you get here?

I wasn't far from here. I was just meditating. It's still morning. Anyway, we'll still have time to talk. The first thing we need is a temporary home, and that's what I'll do when we get to that village.
Oh yes, I had forgotten that you are allowed to do that.

But remember that this house is not for us. Jeff and Wagner needs a new house, but at least we will have a quieter place, protected from the haunts of the night. You two... Go and do what needs to be done.
Kai smiles slightly during the talk.
You have something much more important to do now.
Rayane and Vinny then smile back in response.
Alright! Good luck to you too Kai!
Heh~ So let's go. It's time for us to run to Blackburn!
Vinny does a small worry smile as him waved to Kai while Rayane's horn then began to shine while she was preparing to run.
Yes... Good luck, Kai. I...
Then suddenly Rayane was starting to run at high speed, leaving a rainbow trail. Vinny then was surprised to see this.
W..What? OH FUCK! CHARMING RAYANE! WAIT ME!
Vinny then started trying to follow Rayane.
W...wow? Heh. Yes... Good luck to you both too.
Vinny was surprised by Rayane's speed, trying not to lose her presence.
Heh~ I'll win.
Rayane starts to run faster during the talk.
Hey! COME ON! it's going to break Ivy body more!
Oh... He didn't understand my magic, but that's fine.
Rayane increased her speed even more, doing big push on her hooves to jump very high and start running over the trees, doing parkur to have even more speed in her movements.
WOW! Rayane! This is very fast to me!
Vinny spoke loudly before starting to fly up, following Rayane. That way it was easier Vinny to locate the direction where Rayane was going, so Vinny could see the village mentioned by Rayane.
Yours wasn't the first!~

Vinny was still surprised and kept trying to use him pegasus advantage to try to follow the speed of Rayane's movements. Rayane then smirks at Vinny for a few seconds as she let Vinny get a little closer as her horn shone a little more.
You dropped it!!
Yes~

Vinny put all him strength into flying during the progress. Vinny was not strange, but everything was going faster than usual for a few seconds. At this very moment Rayane then finished the use of magic, making Rayane and Vinny arrive at the village instantly. Rayane very tired due to the accumulation of magic energy to use the spell, it made Vinny get first than her at the end.
YEAH! Dropped his victory!
Rayane was a little impressed, but then she giggles for a few seconds.
Heh~ It doesn't even look like the same little Vinny that I trained the flight a while ago~

Rayane does a huge jump towards the top of the village wall then stayed the rest of the way on top of the wall, finishing braking the movements until she came face to face with a guard extremely scared of Rayane's movements.
G...good morning Rayane... You didn't forget that we have a gate, right?
The guard was trying to understand what had just happened and how Vinny and Rayane arrived so fast.
Shhhhhhh~ Good morning. Don't worry. The next day I remember. Silly one~
Rayane breathed deeply to recover her breath and began to go down the steps of the village wall slowly, walked toward Vinny that was on the floor waiting for her.
We're here~
Vinny was curious, thinking about guard. Vinny rubs him hoof over the head.
R..Rayane? When will I be known too? Hm?

Heh heh~ Excellent. Vinny was very distracted by the race. Now I just need to arrive at the hospital to try to save Ivy life. I hope no one has felt the energy of this magic. This was more than necessary to use.
Good morning guard.
Heh~ Everything in its own time. Silly Vinny~
Hmmmm. Yeah! Okay! And Good morning guard.
The guard was even more confused and scare to realize that he had not seen Vinny too.
Wh... what? And another guest?! Good morning... Please go down the wall before someone comes along to scold me because I'm leaving civilians up here.
Heh~ sorry, we needed to take a shortcut to an emergency.
Meanwhile, Vinny could see that in the center of the village there were many ponies in one place.
Yes... but... Ah? What's going on?
Vinny then tried to follow Rayane. Rayane was tired, but she continued to follow her way to the hospital.
Don't worry, the center of the village is a big market. Do not miss the focus of our goal.
Aaaah... Okay okay! Don't talk! Let's go!

Rayane keep walking inside the village, some ponies were surprised, trying to understand the reason about Rayane was in a hurry, Vinny just continued to follow Rayane as if nothing had happened, trying not to pay much attention.
Come here. We are almost there!
Yeah!
Rayane then finally came close to the hospital door, and entered as quickly as possible.
Pheew! Finally! Ah yes! Finaaally! We arrived.
Rayane was panting, and Vinny was a little worried, so Vinny just looked at Rayane curiously.
R..Rayane? And now?
Follow me again...
Rayane then walked between ponies, making all the possible effort until finally arrived at the attendant.
Oh yes... Everypony... just down the hall... Doctor is wating for you and... W..What?! R...Rayane?!
No talking! This is an emergency!
Hospital attendant looked very curiously at Rayane, trying to understand what was really happening.
W..What? B..but...but what emergency? And... I'm not seeing anyone hurt.
Rayane took off the clothes that were covering Ivy's body and started to levitate her.
She needs a stretcher now!
Oh! M..my Rainbow! Okay okay...I'm bring a stretcher now!

The hospital attendant then began to contact the hospital emergency team. Viny only see ponies waiting for service, and everyone was very surprised by the scene that was happening, trying to understand what was happening.
W...Well! Everyone here seems more surprised than me.
OKAY! Everypony getting out of the way NOW! This is more than an emergency! Now!
W...Wow!

Vinny see some earth ponies arriving with the stretcher. Rayane put Ivy on the stretcher without thinking twice during the progress. Then the doctors send Ivy to the hall. Everyone was still surprised, but Rayane ignored everyone's reaction and just breathed deeply on relief.
Phew! I... I did it. Y..Yes. I did. F..finaaaally.
Rayane then realized that the hospital attendant was looking at her very curiously.

R...Rayane? This is a surprise to see here! I never seen you on a hospital or bring some patient to a hospital. Our hospital network has no information about you. We will generate your password for you to be allowed to enter soon. Alright? But... W..What happened for you came here?
This is personal. And please register his name too. He's with me.
Then Rayane introduced Vinny during the talk. The attendant was a little more surprised to see Vinny.
O..Oh! W..Well... Okay. Hello! What's your name?
Hospital Attendant smiled nervously in response. Vinny thought it was a little strange, but only responded normally.
Vinny, my name is Vinny.
A..ah yes. And what are you? What is your marital status?
Hmm... Just being friends. But in the future maybe married. Heh! I think this charming pony is very beautiful for someone like me.
The attendant was a little blushed, not understanding what was happening, she seemed embarrassed and very confused.
R..Really?
Vinny... Silly you~
Okay okay! Here is the password for the registration of the two of you. The doctor will come to call you two soon.
The attendant then showed the scannement table, and Rayane progressed to let the Smartmoby be scanned.
Oh! Thank you very much!
Vinny smiles during the talk.
I say the same~
Then the attendant was still smiling nervously, and waved them both before returning to work.
Yes...yes. I'm happy for this. Sorry for my attitude. I need to keep my posture.
Hihi! All right.
Vinny pretended that everything was normal and just walked with Rayane.
Rayane? Really? Why doesn't anyone come up to me and say... Vinny? Why only Rayane? What do I need to do to be known like you?
Shhhhh~ Long story. I've done a lot in this world. Some moment will come your time too, I'm sure about this.
Rayane breathed deeply before continuing the conversation sadly.
And I hope you can do it all the right way.
Rayane sit on one of the benches and started to wait while she was very thoughtful about Ivy.

It looks like things are going well. Nothing came out of my plan. Now I just need to be patient. I'm sure the time we'll stay here will be more than enough for Kai to help others find the house for all of us to stay.

Hey Rayane. I understand, I just hope I don't get known in the first moments in this world like a Rayane's helper partner. Hihi! I like getting somewhere everyone says... "Look! Rayane and her help partner...". I even accept a "Look", and "Rayane and Vinny", or "Look! This is Vinny and Rayane...".
Vinny then giggles a little about the conversation, trying to make Rayane feel better.
But! What are we going to do now?
Heh. Silly you. Don't worry. I'll give you a little help to promote your title~
Rayane giggles a little, trying to maintain a positive talk.
But we'll have to wait some doctor come here for now. Will you want to talk more about something?
Vinny was a little thoughtful for a few seconds before answering.
Okay. A good talk... What do you know about Ivy's condition? You suddenly wanted to run non-stop at full speed and before you didn't care. Did she get worse? Do you know something?
Rayane then looked at the floor like a mirror, thinking about the past for a few seconds before looking at Vinny again.
Just worries... Maybe I'm very anxious to see that she hasn't even opened an eye yet.
Really? Promise are you telling the truth?
Rayane was then a little curious about Vinny's curiosity, Rayane just made a little sad smile.

Yes. I promise. My despair was happening when I felt her smartmoby getting weak even more. I didn't want to see her energy like this. Hiroshi's death makes me feel that this pony needs to be my little hope for a better future in my feelings.
Vinny then smiled a little as he heard Rayane's answer.
Hm... What does that mean? Was Ivy getting weaker?
Yes. The weaker her soul gets... the closer to death she is. This energy inside her soul cannot end.
Rayane slowly became a little more worried, but tried to accept the situation that was happening, she just closed her eyes and kept talking.
I myself almost ended up using all my soul energy accidentally during my magic spells.
Vinny was then thoughtful, trying to understand Rayane's words, then replied.
Oh... Is there something inside her that is bad? Something like a internal bleeding?
Are you saying about something like a body blood? No. That doesn't exist in this world. Our body has a different composition.
Vinny was a little confused, and tried to understand what he remembered about what James said about Pony Driland's dimension.
D..Different composition? Ah! I see. Well! Let's wait then. Do you want to talk about something more?
No. Thank you Vinny... But I want just wait now. We can talk better about it later.
Vinny was then curious, trying to understand Rayane's behavior change.
Are you sure?
Yes. But it's easier for us to talk about Ivy after hearing the doctor's words for now.
Hm! A good thing will not be. Before waiting, how does it work? We need to pay to use hospital in this world?
Yes. But don't worry about it. I'll pay for everything myself. Maybe the hospital is the only different place I know that has a little more freedom technology.
Freedom technology? I...I... Okay! Let's wait.

So a few hours passed, Vinny and Rayane were already tired, but they were still sitting waiting for something to happen. Rayane was a little depressed when thinking about Ivy, but then she stopped being thoughtful when she heard the presence of a female unicorn coming.
Vinny? Rayane? I need to talk to you two...
Vinny would then open his eyes a little and look curiously at Raynae.
Ah... Rayane?
H..huh? Ah yes. Hello doctor.
Rayane then got a little anxious, and looked at the doctor.
Hello. So please... follow me. We have good news and bad news.
W..What?
Rayane was worried to hear that, so Vinny and Rayane got up and started to follow the doctor.
Hm? Did something happen?
Yes. We did several tests. As much as she is alive, we still have a very serious problem to deal with...
Then everyone finally arrived in Ivy's room, and started to enter the room slowly.
W...Well... Doctor? What's the problem?
Vinny was starting to feel worried looking at Rayane. Rayane seemed to really want that moment to end.
Well...

Doctor closes the door for everything to be silent. Everyone then finally could see Ivy lying on the bed. Ivy was still asleep, but her body felt weak and dry. All that could be seen was a power cable connected to Ivy's smartmoby.
Looks like your friend is in a coma. That means her body has definitely stopped responding. Her entire body is very damaged, preventing her from regaining her energies.
Doctor looked at Vinny and Rayane's astonished reaction, so the doctor tried to speak more calmly.
